channel.title: Few Teamtorva source questions
channel.description:
OK guys before i ask for help i am warning you that im a noob at coding and yes im a leech so i ask for your patience so.. How do i add a ring of vigour effect ? How do i change log out text where it says "When you have finished playing TeamTorva...." How do i add working dice ? Right now my dice bag doesnt do anything for any of the options when right clicked?
Please help if you can

item.title: Few Teamtorva source questions

so… How do i add a ring of vigour effect ?
